refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Extends the GIcon interface and adds the ability to load icons from streams.

refsect2.title: GLoadableIcon
refsect2.para: Generic type for all kinds of icons that can be loaded as a stream.

refsect2.title: GLoadableIconIface
refsect2.para: Interface for icons that can be loaded as a stream.

listitem.simpara: The parent interface.
Loads an icon.
Loads an icon asynchronously.
Finishes an asynchronous icon load.

refsect2.title: g_loadable_icon_load ()
refsect2.programlisting: GInputStream* g_loadable_icon_load (GLoadableIcon *icon, int size, char **type, GCancellable *cancellable, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Loads a loadable icon. For the asynchronous version of this function, see g_loadable_icon_load_async().

listitem.simpara: a GLoadableIcon.
an integer.
a location to store the type of the loaded icon, NULL to ignore.
optional GCancellable object, NULL to ignore.
a GError location to store the error occuring, or NULL to ignore.
a GInputStream to read the icon from.

refsect2.title: g_loadable_icon_load_async ()
refsect2.programlisting: void g_loadable_icon_load_async (GLoadableIcon *icon, int size, GCancellable *cancellable, GAsyncReadyCallback callback, gpointer user_data);
refsect2.para: Loads an icon asynchronously. To finish this function, see g_loadable_icon_load_finish(). For the synchronous, blocking version of this function, see g_loadable_icon_load().

listitem.simpara: a GLoadableIcon.
an integer.
optional GCancellable object, NULL to ignore.
a GAsyncReadyCallback to call when the request is satisfied
the data to pass to callback function

refsect2.title: g_loadable_icon_load_finish ()
refsect2.para: Finishes an asynchronous icon load started in g_loadable_icon_load_async().

listitem.simpara: a GLoadableIcon.
a GAsyncResult.
a location to store the type of the loaded icon, NULL to ignore.
a GError location to store the error occuring, or NULL to ignore.
a GInputStream to read the icon from.
